product_name: ClarinsMulti-Active Night Moisturizer for Lines, Pores, Glow with Niacinamide
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackClarins Multi-Active Night Moisturizer for Lines, Pores, Glow with Niacinamide targets first signs of aging to visibly smooth lines, refine pores, and help strengthen moisture barrier for a healthy glow.
details: DetailsBenefitsVisibly smoothes lines, refines texture, and boosts radianceHelps reinforce skin's moisture barrierEvens skin tone and visibly tightens poresHelps rejuvenate and renew skin overnightTargets first lines and wrinklesProvides 24-Hour Hydration**Clinical study - Night Cream, All Skin Types - 30 women - 24HKey Ingredients2% Niacinamide visibly smoothes fine lines and refines skin textureOrganic Sea Holly bio-extract* helps to reinforce the skin's moisture barrierOrganic Strawberry Tree Fruit extract* refines skin texture and visibly tightens poresBetaine moisturizes + plumps the skin's surfaceAn anti-aging tetrapeptide helps visibly firm while renewing skin overnightAnti-Pollution Complex of Organic White Horehound, Furcellaria and Nipplewort extracts helps minimize damage from environmental pollutants - indoors and out - including skin-aging blue lights from electronics.*Organic ingredients are produced in accordance with European regulation (CE 2018/848).Research Results25% visibly reduced fine lines & wrinkles**5.1% Visible reduction in pores***92% Visibly smoother****92% Boosts glow*******Based on self-evaluation of Multi-Active Night Cream - All Skin Types by 100 women after 28 days***Based on clinical study of Multi-Active Night Cream - All Skin Types with 31 women after 28 days****Based on consumer tests of Multi-Active Night Cream - All Skin Types with 100 women*****Based on consumer test with 107 women after 28 days of using the Multi-Active Day and Night duo for all skin typesItem 2620944How To UseSmooth over clean face and neck each evening.Apply with gentle press-and-release movements, avoiding the eye contour area.Work downward, over neck and décolleté.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Ether, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Betaine, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Niacinamide, Dimethicone, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Parfum/Fragrance, Propylene Glycol, Cellulose, Cetearyl Glucoside, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Butylene Glycol, Polysilicone-11, Chlorphenesin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Disodium Edta, Eryngium Maritimum Extract, Marrubium Vulgare Extract, Phenethyl Alcohol, Decyl Glucoside, Furcellaria Lumbricalis Extract, Arbutus Unedo Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Lapsana Communis Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Maris Sal/Sea Salt/Sel Marin, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-2, Dextran, [V4299A].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Smooth over clean face and neck each evening.Apply with gentle press-and-release movements, avoiding the eye contour area.Work downward, over neck and décolleté.

reviews.headline: My favorite
reviews.comments: I love this moisturizer. It is so smooth going onto the skin and absorbs very nicely. There is a noticeable difference almost immediately.

reviews.headline: I can't love this product enough!
reviews.comments: This cream makes my face feel so moisturized but not sticky. The scent is wonderful and it really works to hydrate those fine lines.

reviews.headline: Glow
reviews.comments: I just got mine in the mail and although I can't speak on its use long term, overnight feels amazing. My skin feels plump, soft, refreshed and it smells great.

reviews.headline: Why did they change a great thing?
reviews.comments: Just OK. I Loved the old (Blue Jar) night cream. This is so unfortunate Clarins is a wonderful company but I DO NOT like all of these new changes. The jar is physically smaller. The amt says its the same but jar held up to my old Blue Jar is definitely smaller. It just felt better in my hand (The old Blue Jar). Other Clarins (New rehabbed Clarins) items have indeed shrunk. The Old Favorite of mine (one step orange scrub) was shrunk from 4.2 oz to 3.9 oz. And more money. And changed. This  product (night cream) is just not the same. I love Clarins but I miss the old formula. Why change a Great thing that actually works? For decades my mother and I could reliably go back year after year to repurchase favorite beauty products or clothes we loved and now they are gone in a flash! I don't like this at all. It's sad. Really is. My Mom would hate this.

reviews.headline: I would buy product again!
reviews.comments: Love this face cream. It moisturizes well without feeling greasy. Makes my face feel soft and it's making my fine lines around my eyes and forehead seem less pronounced.

reviews.headline: Pores just as big
reviews.comments: The pores on my nose have not gotten any smaller. The skin is smoother though. Goes on smooth as a night moisturizer. I noticed the night moisturizers are more wax like in the way they sluff off you if rubbed in too much.

reviews.headline: The Good stuff
reviews.comments: I get it it may work for some people and not for other but let me tell you this is magic in a jar i love how soft my skin feels and hydrated it is after using it i love it i used the hydrating gentle and the hydrating toning and the double serum and then the day or night i do my facial twice a day once in the a.m. and before bed my skin looks it feels amazing

reviews.headline: Great Moisturizer
reviews.comments: I got this as a sample with one of my Ulta purchases. I rarely ever like a sample product enough to buy the full size. This was an exception! I used it for a few days and fell in love. Its a great moisturizer, not too heavy for my oily skin, and the smell is lovely.

media.headline: holy grail!
media.caption: my texture has diminished and you can see the glow coming through!!

media.headline: Holy grail!
media.caption: my texture has significantly diminished and you can see a glow coming through!!

media.headline: Hydrates my skin and smells great
media.caption: Can't wait to try!

faceoff_positive.comments: I received Clarins new multiactive nightbcream complimentary from Clarins and skeepers in exchange for my honest review. So my honest opinion is that this cream is just love. From packaging to final effects its  all great. I love he pink jar that looks so luxorious. Than talking about ingredients it has some interesting natural ingredients of which the ones I liked most are Niacinamide, sea holly and strawberry tree. All these natural ingredients are intended to target fine lines and wrinkles that appear on face as a sign of aging and also due to stress. My skin was getting dehydrated, loosing moisture barrier and having all the signs of stress and fatigue because of my sleepless nights with my little one. So this cream was just God sent for me and it is reverting my skin to look more hydrated glowy and fresh. It has a nice creamy texture, it's easy to use and to apply to skin. Gets instantly absorbed and does not leave any stickiness. Skin feels so soft and smooth and hydrated after use. It would definitely recommend this.
faceoff_positive.headline: Smooth and nice

faceoff_negative.comments: I used the older formula (blue jar) for over ten years! It was my product of choice and I never intended to stop using it.  I don't understand Clarins' need to change such a wonderful product to this! I wish they would have asked their clients' opinions. The formula is irritating, not as rich, and burns! After applying it, my face was immediately red and burning.  I had to wash my face. I changed to Nuxe and had to leave Clarins after so many years. It's very unfortunate.
faceoff_negative.headline: Horrible product

rollup.name: Multi-Active Night Moisturizer for Lines, Pores, Glow with Niacinamide
